casebody.data:
COMMISSIONER OF LABOR
v.
WEEKLEY HOMES. No. 271P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 30, 2005. Thomas A. Farr, Phillip J. Strach, Bernhard Mueller, Cary, Robert E. Rader, Jr., for Weekley Homes. Jane Ammons Gilchrist, Assistant Attorney General, for Commissioner of Labor. J. Michael Carpenter, for National Asso. Home Bldrs., et al. Julie W. Hampton, Raleigh, for NC Asso. of Defense Attorneys. Philip M. VanHoy, Charlotte, for NC Citizens for Business, et al. Richard M. Lewis, Raleigh, for Capital Associated Ind., et al.

The following order has been entered on the conditional motion filed on the 25th day of May 2005 by NC Association of Defense Attorneys for leave to file Amicus Curiae Brief:

"Motion Dismissed as moot. By order of the Court in conference this the 30th day of June 2005."
